TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IObserver`1<- T>
generic <typename T> public interface class IObserver

span.span: The object that provides notification information.

summary.span: 提供接收推播通知的機制。

span.span: Provides a mechanism for receiving push-based notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和介面提供通用的機制，如需推入型通知，也稱為觀察器設計模式。The and interfaces provide a generalized mechanism for push-based notification, also known as the observer design pattern. 介面表示的類別，就會傳送通知 （提供者）;介面代表接收它們 （觀察者） 的類別。The interface represents the class that sends notifications (the provider); the interface represents the class that receives them (the observer). `T` 代表提供通知資訊的類別。`T` represents the class that provides the notification information. 實作來排列，從提供者會收到通知 (實作) 藉由傳遞到提供者本身的執行個體方法。An implementation arranges to receive notifications from a provider (an implementation) by passing an instance of itself to the provider's method. 這個方法會傳回物件，可用來取消訂閱之前，提供者觀察者完成傳送通知。This method returns an object that can be used to unsubscribe the observer before the provider finishes sending notifications. 介面會定義觀察者必須實作下列三種方法：The interface defines the following three methods that the observer must implement: - 方法，通常會提供觀察者以新的資料或狀態資訊提供者所呼叫。The method, which is typically called by the provider to supply the observer with new data or state information. - 方法，通常會呼叫提供者，以表示資料無法使用，無法存取，或已損毀，或此提供者發生某些錯誤情況。The method, which is typically called by the provider to indicate that data is unavailable, inaccessible, or corrupted, or that the provider has experienced some other error condition. - 方法，通常會呼叫以表示它已完成傳送通知給觀察者的提供者。The method, which is typically called by the provider to indicate that it has finished sending notifications to observers. ## Examples 下列範例說明觀察器設計模式。The following example illustrates the observer design pattern. 它會定義`Location`包含經度和緯度資訊類別。It defines a `Location` class that contains latitude and longitude information. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#5)] `LocationReporter`類別提供實作。The `LocationReporter` class provides the implementation. 它顯示到主控台的目前位置的相關資訊。It displays information about the current location to the console. 其建構函式包括`name`參數，這樣可以讓`LocationReporter`其字串輸出中識別本身的執行個體。Its constructor includes a `name` parameter, which allows the `LocationReporter` instance to identify itself in its string output. 它也包含`Subscribe`方法，這個方法會包裝到提供者的呼叫方法。It also includes a `Subscribe` method, which wraps a call to the provider's method. 這可讓您方法將傳回的指定私用變數的參考。This enables the method to assign the returned reference to a private variable. `LocationReporter`類別還包括`Unsubscribe`方法，這個方法會呼叫方法所傳回的物件方法。The `LocationReporter` class also includes an `Unsubscribe` method, which calls the method of the object returned by the method. 下列程式碼定義`LocationReporter`類別。The following code defines the `LocationReporter` class. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#8)] `LocationTracker`類別提供實作。The `LocationTracker` class provides the implementation. 其`TrackLocation`方法會傳遞 null`Location`包含經度和緯度資料的物件。Its `TrackLocation` method is passed a nullable `Location` object that contains the latitude and longitude data. 如果`Location`值不是`null`、`TrackLocation`方法呼叫方法的每個觀察者。If the `Location` value is not `null`, the `TrackLocation` method calls the method of each observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#6)] 如果`Location`值是`null`、`TrackLocation`方法具現化`LocationNotFoundException`物件，下列範例所示。If the `Location` value is `null`, the `TrackLocation` method instantiates a `LocationNotFoundException` object, which is shown in the following example. 然後它會呼叫每個觀察者方法並將其傳遞`LocationNotFoundException`物件。It then calls each observer's method and passes it the `LocationNotFoundException` object. 請注意，`LocationNotFoundException`衍生自但不會新增任何新的成員。Note that `LocationNotFoundException` derives from but does not add any new members. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/provider.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/provider.vb#7)] 觀察器註冊以接收來自通知`TrackLocation`物件藉由呼叫其方法，將觀察者物件的參考指派給私用泛型物件。Observers register to receive notifications from a `TrackLocation` object by calling its method, which assigns a reference to the observer object to a private generic object. 方法會傳回`Unsubscriber`物件，它是讓觀察者停止接收通知的實作。The method returns an `Unsubscriber` object, which is an implementation that enables observers to stop receiving notifications. `LocationTracker`類別還包括`EndTransmission`方法。The `LocationTracker` class also includes an `EndTransmission` method. 任何其他位置的資料可用時，方法會呼叫每個觀察者方法然後清除 觀察者的內部清單。When no further location data is available, the method calls each observer's method and then clears the internal list of observers. 下列程式碼接著會執行個體化提供者和觀察者。The following code then instantiates the provider and the observer. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/program.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/module1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnCompleted() cil managed

summary.span: 通知觀察者，提供者已完成傳送推播通知。

span.span: Notifies the observer that the provider has finished sending push-based notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當觀察者的實作稱為方法可以選擇性地呼叫方法物件時呼叫該方法所傳回之觀察者方法。When the observer's implementation is called, the method can optionally call the method of the object that was returned to the observer when it called the method. ## Examples 下列範例提供的實作經緯度追蹤應用程式中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 這個方法只會回報任何其他資料使用，並呼叫提供者的實作。The method simply reports that no further data is available and calls the provider's implementation. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的完整範例的主題。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#11)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnError(class System.Exception error) cil managed

param.name: error
param.span: 提供錯誤其他資訊的物件。

span.span: An object that provides additional information about the error.

summary.span: 通知觀察器此提供者發生錯誤狀況。

span.span: Notifies the observer that the provider has experienced an error condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然`error`是衍生自物件，不一定代表提供者所擲回例外狀況。Although `error` is an object that is derived from , it does not necessarily represent an exception that is thrown by the provider. 它也可以代表例行性或預期的錯誤條件，例如遺失或無法使用的資料。It can also represent a routine or expected error condition, such as data that is missing or unavailable. 方法應該看到成參考用訊息，並提供者不應該提供錯誤處理觀察者。The method should be seen as informational, and the provider should not expect the observer to provide error handling. ## Examples 下列範例提供的實作經緯度追蹤應用程式中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 這個方法只會回報資料是目前無法使用;不會使用物件做為參數傳遞給它。The method simply reports that data is currently unavailable; it does not make use of the object passed to it as a parameter. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的完整範例的主題。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnNext(!T value) cil managed

span.span: Provides the observer with new data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 觀察者有呼叫提供者之後方法，提供者呼叫觀察者的方法以提供通知。After an observer has called a provider's method, the provider calls the observer's method to provide notifications. ## Examples 下列範例提供的實作經緯度追蹤應用程式中的方法。The following example provides an implementation of the method in a latitude/longitude tracking application. 請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的完整範例的主題。See the Example section of the topic for the complete example. [!code-csharp[System.IObserver.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/cs/observer.cs#12)] [!code-vb[System.IObserver.Class#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.iobserver.class/vb/observer.vb#12)]
